body.name: Wireless Keyboard, Bluetooth Keyboard Rechargeable, Bluetooth 5.0 + 2.4G Dual Mode Keyboard with Numeric Pad, Slim Full Size Keyboard for Macbook, Android, Windows, Laptop, Computer, Tablet (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 16 mins
features: 【DUAL Mode BT 5.0 /3.0 + 2.4GHz Wireless Keyboard】The dual-mode wireless keyboard only needs one switch to realize the free switching of one keyboard between two devices. It can connect one device through Bluetooth 5.0/3.0 and another device through a 2.4GHz USB receiver. Bluetooth can achieve efficient operation within 10m. Note: You can't use Bluetooth mode and 2.4G mode at the same time.
【Rechargeable Keyboard】Compact keyboard with 500mAh rechargeable battery. 2-3 hours fully charged, 50 hours long using time,standy time more than 130 days.

【Widely Compatible】Dual mode keyboard with 2.4G + Bluetooth technology widely compatible with Apple, Macbook, Android, iOS, Windows, Laptop, Computer, Tablet, iPad. Smooth touch and premium look makes it a perfect match for your tablet.

【Ultra Thin and Light Laptop Keyboard】Full size laptop keyboard compact design (L14.48*W4.72*H0.19 in). Ergonomic slim keyboard provide comfortable typing, reducing strain on your wrists. It is particularly slim and light allowing for easy portability.

【Compact Keyboard with Numeric Keypad】Featuring a scissor switch design and numeric keypad, Bluetooth keyboard is comfortable to type on and improves productivity. Fully equipped keyboard with quiet keys, multimedia function keys and convenient number pad.

【Auto-sleep-Energy Saving】The Auto Switch Off function will help you save energy as your Bluetooth keyboard will switch off when your PC is turned off or the receiver is disconnected. If you do not use the 2.4G wireless keyboard for 10 minutes, it will go to sleeping mode. Click any button, the keyboard could be activated normally.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Idle 10 minutes the wireless keyboard will automatically into sleep mode, press any keys of the keyboard it will automatically into working mode. Wireless keyboard can connect up to 3 devices seamlessly.Widely use for iMac, Macbook, laptop, Windows, Computer, Android, iPad pro/air, iPhone 11/xs /max/x/8/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6, Samsung Galaxy S10/S9/S8, Google Nexus, etc. Full size bluetooth keyboard with numeric keypad, making typing easier and more comfortable and effcient for working.

Compact design keyboard with (L14.48*W4.72*H0.19 in). Ergonomic slim keyboard provide comfortable typing, reducing strain on your wrists. Scissor switch keyboard makes typing more silent and gives you a comfortable working environment The bottom of the keyboard is designed with a non-slip pad, which can be used smoothly on the desktop and more comfortable for typing.

FAQ Q1: Fail to connect 2.4G (USB) ? Step 1: Charge the keyboard for 2 hours. Step 2: Power on the keyboard. Step 3: Plug the USB into your device. Step 4: Press FN+3 to open 2.4G mode Step 5: Don"t forget to press "Connect" button Q2: Fail to connect BLUETOOTH ? Step 1: On your device, turn off the Bluetooth and turn it on again to refresh. Step 2: Power on the keyboard. Step 3: Press "FN+1"/ "FN+2" to open Bluetooth mode. Step 4: Press "Connect" button, connect "Bluetooth 3.0/5.0" by your device. Q3: What are the dimensions of the keyboard? 36.8cm x 12cm / 14.48in x 4.72in Q4: Our Service If you have any problems, please tell us and we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's fine. It is just a keyboard. The bluetooth connection is stable It also works while plugged into the charger. The battery only lasts a few days before it stops connecting automatically. The meter says the battery is at 83%, but I have to connect manually or recharge the battery. I am using Bluetooth 5. Edit: after some time for break-in the battery lasts over a week now.I use ubuntu linux in bluetooth mode. When it wakes and I start typing the system settings windows always pops up. I can work around it by using alt+ F4 to close it. Edit : this issue was solved when I did function/w. In Android mode it works fine.I would buy this product again because the price was good. But since it does not work correctly with linux I will not. Edit : I have changed the rating to five stars because the battery lasts much longer now. Apparently it needed time for break-in. With some adjustments I've discovered it works extremely well with Linux. I use Ubuntu 22.04 and I discovered that I can customize any keystroke. The only thing I find irritating is that every time it wakes up the system properties screen pops up. But I just hit Alt /f4 and it goes away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do like this keyboard. I didn’t read the description well enough and didn’t realize it doesn’t have risers in the back to give it a tilt. Overall I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice compact keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Real nice feel though it takes a little bit to get used to the compact size, in the end it is a nice keyboard. Also a very nice ability to use either wireless or bluetooth connection which once you turn the computer on it seemlessly connects right off the top. For the price and what you get with it, I think you will be happy with this purchase.. It is also nice it has a full number pad on the keyboard... some do not have that. I have the white but they also make a black keyboard too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent bluetooth laptop, buttons a bit smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Overall I like it. However I measured it next to my old wireless keyboard and my laptop keyboard, and the QWERTY keys on this are slightly smaller in width than the ones I was using.This was a bit of an issue at first use, but after about a week of use, I guess my brain updated, and my fingers have adjusted to the new dimensions so much that I realized I didn't notice the slight variation in width.UPDATE:I have had about a month, and with less than moderate use. I was noticing that the space bar with double space often, and I thought it was just me, but after reading other reviews, I realized it wasn't and have decided to return it. It wasn't a noticeable issue at first because my use has been less than moderate so far because of the holiday season, but now that I am getting back into the swing of productivity, it isn't something that I can live with.The battery life seems to be decent this far, and overall, it isn't a terrible keyboard, just a small quirk that makes it impractical for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work properly!
reviews.reviewText: Since the day one, doesn’t work properly!I have a MacBook and this keyboard should connect with it. Bluetooth didn’t work at all. It even connect at first, but got disconnecting ALL THE TIME. So annoying! So I decided to use the USB plug (I already had a connector adapter for my screen monitor, and it also have the USB entry) and it works, I thought. But all the time when I was writing, it stop working, or put extra letters, or extra dots, or didn’t put all the letters I typed, STRESSFUL! I need it for work, and I have to been revising EVER SINGLE SENTENCE I wrote. I don’t recommend.I don’t need a fancy keyboard, but the least I need one that works properly!After 2 weeks trying, it stop working at all. I am open a devolution today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Double types letters
reviews.reviewText: It feels and looks good, but the keys very often will double click. This is a major annoyance for anyone needing to write for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to connect & use
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely great quality! The key word was very easy to connect and simple to use. Its light weight and fits easily into my work bag. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good keyboard, but the bluetooth is flaky
reviews.reviewText: I use this with a Mac Powerbook. I tried to use it with the Bluetooth, both BT3 and BT5, but it kept dropping. I finally just switched to using the dongle and it's been working good since. Quite sturdy. Only 4 stars due to the bluetooth issues.
